Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: D. C. Russell "willow dragonfly"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, a nice smaller shape for your hands, and takes fine photographs. Not complicated or confusing when loading photos from camera to computer.

Reviews.Title: good one
Reviews.Author: Mohamed Erman "Mohamed"
Reviews.Content: good effective camera and easy to use. I used it and it works amazingly. In my opinion it is the best to those who want to buy good camera in a reasonable price

Reviews.Title: Good basic digital Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Bill Isemann
Reviews.Content: Takes very nice pictures for a $50 camera. I bought this for one of our technicians to be able to document inspection items that needed an expanation. The only reason I gave it a four instead a five is that the viewfinder does not give the shot justice and their isn't a focus indicator.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for me
Reviews.Author: M. Lauroel
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews for the different colors of this camera model, so got a better overview of people's opinions that way. As long as it's the same model number, the color doesn't matter, and there are more reviews posted for some of the other colors of this camera.It doesn't matter whether you are budgeting because you have to or because you want to save money for your future or for some other reason, this camera will definitely fit a budget better than most of the digital cameras out there. One reviewer stated that those who gave good reviews of this camera have probably not owned a nice camera previously. Well, I do fit into that category of not having owned an expensive camera before, but regardless, I love this camera. I have had a barrel of fun wih it. It is easy to use for someone such as myself who does not know a lot about photo-taking. To me, it takes great pictures, with great color, and I could not be happier with it. I got a 2 GB Sandisk memory card (from Amazon) and a Transcend card reader (very inexpensive from Amazon--$8.54 including shipping compared to $35 or $40 for others--and works great for my MSNTV internet device, about which I was very concerned about finding any compatible card reader anywhere at any price). So at this point I am a very happy buyer. Amazon rocks!!  I have been really happy with photos of sunsets, my bottle trees, crafts projects, trees, myself (taken by myself just holding my arm out and snapping a photo at arm's length), paintings I've done, and more. I have not tried the video mode yet so can't comment on that. One note--this camera will hold only one photo in its internal memory. You pretty much have to purchase a memory card. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants to take photos that don't require professional results. Again, I love it.

Reviews.Title: No Easyshare!
Reviews.Author: melissa
Reviews.Content: As of March 15, 2013 Kodak stopped allowing downloads of Easyshare. The camera's easyshare feature is not usable unless you already have the software installed. Buying the camera now for the share feature is completely and utterly useless.

Reviews.Title: Simple point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: John T
Reviews.Content: Simple point and shoot camera, excellent for people who do not like a lot of bells and whistles.Order SDHC memory card, does not come with one. Also purchase good quality lithium-ion or nickel-metal hydride AA batteries with charger. Camera requires two but four is better for long shooting sessions.

Reviews.Title: It's a good price.
Reviews.Author: Dad
Reviews.Content: Only one issue the software is no longer available so you can't download pics using usb. But you can always buy a memory card which I did and pop it into your cpu or laptop which is the same thing. So for the price it was worth it.

Reviews.Title: grandma glo
Reviews.Author: grandma glo
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kodak Easyshare C1505 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Zoom - Silver for a friend for Christmas.  She is enjoying it so much after using a model with film and having it developed, etc for years.  She loves to take pictures of baby kittens that she fosters until they can be adopted.  It will help her.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare
Reviews.Author: tazmania "belleadonna"
Reviews.Content: Aptly named. This camera takes really good pictures and it is very easy to use. I have no problems getting the pictures onto my computer and the pictures are good and clear. I am not a professional photographer and this is not for the pros but it more than meets my needs.

Reviews.Title: Just Right
Reviews.Author: Linda C. Kitzhaber
Reviews.Content: All I need to take snapshots of life's happenings. Haven't played with it enough yet to get used to all the features and will have to purchase some rechargeable batteries if I end up using it a lot, but it's small, light and easy to carry in pocket or purse.

Reviews.Title: just what i needed!
Reviews.Author: los dogg
Reviews.Content: Very impressed by the quality compared to the price! Pictures come out crystal clear, and the camera isn't hard to figure out at all.(very user friendly) All in all, its a very practical and affordable camera, then again what'd you expect from modal!

Reviews.Title: ripped off
Reviews.Author: BC
Reviews.Content: It would be nice if you put in your discription that you can't get the software anymore thats false advertising I now have a camera I can't use the advertised share features

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Rafa929
Reviews.Content: I bought 5 of these cameras and all of them have zooming issues. It's incredible that I can't take any close up pictures because the photos are always blurry.I will never buy a Kodak easy share camera again. I'd ratter pay some extra bucks for a product that at least can take decent photos.

Reviews.Title: KODAK EASYSHARE C1505 CAMERA
Reviews.Author: BELLE SMITH
Reviews.Content: THIS IS THE SECOND ONE I HAVE. I HAD PURCHASED ONE LOCALLY IN 2006 AND THIS ONE IS SIMILAR.  EASY TO OPERATE, LIGHTWEIGHT, TAKES GOOD PICTURES.  I LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: It's a good product!
Reviews.Author: jose ramos
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product! very comfortable to use it.very good pictures, easy to handle .thank's!jose armando ramos from venezuela

Reviews.Title: You Get What You Pay For
Reviews.Author: Robert H. Woody
Reviews.Content: With this inexpensive Kodak, I am not getting the sharp images and color that I would prefer. However, it was well below $100, so perhaps it is unrealistic to expect better quality. It is adequate for photos of kids blowing out candles on birthday cakes, family gatherings, and distant scenes. It is inadequate, in my opinion, for photos that can be used for commercial purposes or even for posting on Facebook.

Reviews.Title: Okay Camera -- broke after 3 months light use
Reviews.Author: Groton_reader
Reviews.Content: When working, the camera was satisfactory as it fell into the 'inexpensive and nothing fancy' category for me.  Unfortunately, the camera broke after three months of very occasional use so it was not a product on which I could rely.I expected either: (a) a more durable camera although I don't see how my use could have stressed it, or (b) a more solidly constructed camera that doesn't spontaneously break.

Reviews.Title: Fraudulent description
Reviews.Author: SoundMind
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a simple, inexpensive digital camera, trusting both Kodak and Amazon for the quality I expect from both. Though I believe this camera will be ultimately usable for my basic needs, I am extremely disappointed at having been lied to over and over in the product description. I expect much better from Amazon.1. The camera as received takes exactly ONE picture. There is no memory card - a seriously important detail that is not shared. On the contrary, it mentions an included SD card in the physical specifications product description. An additional purchase is required to make it usable.2. Kodak no longer provides or supports software - the notice in the description is flat-out false.3. As for the "sharing destinations" advertised: nope. Most are not available. You can't share to Flickr, YouTube, Twitter and more.I've only just received the camera and can't really do anything with it since I have to get the SD card to make it work. I'm wondering what other lies I've been told that will spring up once I get it fully functional after an additional purchase I had not anticipated. This is very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: amz314
Reviews.Content: The quality matches the $52 price tag, but including internal memory for a grand total of just one picture is disappointing.  I didn't intend to purchase an SD card, but make sure you do!

Reviews.Title: What's so Easy about Easyshare
Reviews.Author: OrioleFan
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and the easyshare printer for my non-technical 90-year old father in law.  First, you can't just sit it on the connector on the printer (doesn't match); you have to connect it with the USB cable provided.  I looked on the Kodak site before I purchased the camera and it said it was compatible with the printer.  It takes good enough pictures for my father in law, but he has to take the camera to a place that prints the pictures for him.  After the first packet of printer paper, the printer jammed.  The "easyshare" printer was a huge waste of time and money.  There is nothing easy about easyshare.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera
Reviews.Author: Callie Hart
Reviews.Content: This camera takes a great photo. I am receiving complaints about the quality of the view screen. But have no major complaints about the product.

Reviews.Title: Seems like a decent camera
Reviews.Author: SlK
Reviews.Content: This is the second day I have been using this camera. It is easy to use and takes decent pictures for the most part. I do not find the colors to be true, however.It was easy to set up & if you ignore the Photo App it downloads pictures to the computer with no problem whatsoever.I am only giving it 4 stars however, because with the flash on it eats batteries like crazy. Also, I do not share pictures on social media & it keeps wanting me to download the Photo App before each download.

Reviews.Title: Short battery life
Reviews.Author: Matt  Taylor
Reviews.Content: This camera uses batteries so fast it's not even worth using.  Even the most expensive ones only lasted an extremely short time. Not worth the cost of all the batteries.  Buy a different camera.

Reviews.Title: SHORT LIVED KODAK CAMERA LIFE WHEN THERE ISN'T FACTORY OR CUSTOMER SUPPORT FOR  REPAIRS.
Reviews.Author: Stan Nemeth
Reviews.Content: PURCHASED THIS CAMERA KNOWING Kodak WAS GOING OUT OF BUSINESS,BUT WAS VERY DISAPOINTED THAT WHEN IT STOPPED SHOWING IMAGES,THERE WASN'T ANY CUSTOMER SERVICE TO REPAIR IT.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare C1505
Reviews.Author: Baby Ruth
Reviews.Content: Easy to work with and lightweight, I replaced this one with one I drop and broke the len. I have used it once and had no problems with it, just the right size to fit in your handbag.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: David Hughey
Reviews.Content: This camera will take a licking and keep on ticking away.  It is durable, resistant to the elements and still will snap beautiful photos.

Reviews.Title: Esayshare
Reviews.Author: Brenda Stelle
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures and carries very well, also easy to down load anywhere to store and save the pictures for printing

Reviews.Title: good approach
Reviews.Author: JEANFRANCO "jeanfranco"
Reviews.Content: excellent little ideal has a good approach to the moment I parce good sharp photographs and important not bulge is good very good

Reviews.Title: lousy pictures
Reviews.Author: suefein
Reviews.Content: I returned it. I would not recommend it to anyone. In my opinion is it misrepresented in its advertising. Pictures unacceptable and I am not a camera buff. Just someone who like to take a picture of the grandkids!

Reviews.Title: Small Camera Capable of Big Pictures
Reviews.Author: James P. Boln
Reviews.Content: The camera is exactly what I wanted.  It is small and light and easy to use.  It takes great pictures and has a zoom feature to get a close-up with out getting in the face of the subject and becoming part of the problem.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera
Reviews.Author: Haven Devine - Premier Contracting
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for the quick, uncomplicated photo.  The 12 MP gives a clear photo if not blown up too large.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: fireman "fireman"
Reviews.Content: Camera works fine, operates different that my older kodak camera. Battery does not last as long as my older camera.

Reviews.Title: This is a 3rd eye
Reviews.Author: Easy Grader
Reviews.Content: Best camera for the price. it is always good to have a third eye that can be used as monitor or evidence when needed

Reviews.Title: Grand daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: lollie4281 "Lollie"
Reviews.Content: My 10 yr old grand daughter loves her camera, especially the video recorder. It's easy to use and takes great photos!

Reviews.Title: LUVIT
Reviews.Author: Visa-chase "jimbo"
Reviews.Content: great price. more GBs..more zoom ...my first ine served me very well. I don't care if they're discontinuing...I go by may past experience with  the product.  great, great service too...

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: bought this camera for my 12 year old grandson who loves to take pictures.  He took beautiful pictures on the family trip to DC and Baltimore.  Very Happy with the outcome.

Reviews.Title: Kodak easyshare was a great gift.
Reviews.Author: Donald Day
Reviews.Content: I rate this camera highly ==it is easy to operate & helped my Daughter to be inspired in photographing this world around her.  You can't go wrong with Kodak Products and the price for this camera was affordable --it takes really nice pics!! She loves this camera.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: very happy with this camera easy to use and it takes good pictures it is better than the last two cameras I owned that were twice as expensive

Reviews.Title: Wished I had saved my money
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I took this camera to the State fair and the pictures I took outside were ok. However the photos in the livestock barns that I took did not turn out real well.  I know the camera was low priced but I wish I would have saved the money i spent on it and purchased a better camera.Ron

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Busy Mamma
Reviews.Content: Shipped quickly and securely.  The camera work great and look near perfect! Everything on the camera works well and I am very pleased with both cameras.

Reviews.Title: camera, disk, case
Reviews.Author: Larry Drifke
Reviews.Content: my sister is very pleased the way it works. Great pictures and very easy to use.this is built for a simple point and shoot

Reviews.Title: Fair product!
Reviews.Author: jhhillis
Reviews.Content: I guess the old expression applies for the camera, ie you get what you pay for.  I only paid $50 and shouldn't expect much more since Kodak has gone out of business.  The camera works great once I figured out how to use it and download to computer since no software came with it.  I found out that Kodak doesn't even have any consumer support now.  My final suggestion is to pay a little more and get something worthwhile.

Reviews.Title: easyshare camera
Reviews.Author: rosie
Reviews.Content: The camera is small as expected, but I have difficulty connecting to Facebook and EmIl. It keeps saying pAssword incorrect.  I am very frustrated.

Reviews.Title: KODAK EASYSHARE
Reviews.Author: SCOUT
Reviews.Content: I HAVE PURCHASED SEVERAL OF THESE CAMREAS FOR OUR FAMILY.  WE TEND TO BE ROUGH ON CAMERAS. THESE ARE GREAT CAMERAS FOR THE PRICE, I LOVE THE QUALITY OF THE PICTURES, THEY ARE GREAT.  IT ALSO TAKES GREAT VIDEO, QUALITY ON THAT GOOD TOO.  TO BE SUCH A COMPACT CAMERA, THE PICTURES ARE GREAT.  IT IS THE ONLY CAMERA I HAVE PURCHACED IN A WHILE, VERY HAPPY WITH IT!

Reviews.Title: Kodak Camera
Reviews.Author: sundance
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my grandaughter for her birthday. It takes great pictures and is a first camera. I would recommend this camera as a starter camera.

Reviews.Title: for my Mother, but
Reviews.Author: Terry Fast
Reviews.Content: I think it crashed her laptop when I tried to download the software so she just needed to plug in the camera to the laptop.  UGH!  She will have to remove the disc and go that route now.  Otherwise it is easy to easy to use for my 75 year Mom.

Reviews.Title: Easy camera
Reviews.Author: Markaye D Lewis
Reviews.Content: Easy to use for an amateur.Just put in batteries and a SD card.  Ready to shoot!  Definitely worth the low cost.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Juan F. Molina
Reviews.Content: Great camera! As advertised! No need to download any drivers using a CD or the Kodak website! All you do is connect to your computer and the drivers install automatically!

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Daniel Leard
Reviews.Content: It's just the right size for me. It's easy to use. I don't take a lot of pictures. It takes care of my needs.

Reviews.Title: Easy does it
Reviews.Author: Prtyma "Prtm"
Reviews.Content: This is the third Kodak camera my famly has bought this year. They are so easy to use and just the right size for everyonel...so,good-bye Canon,Olympus. Kodak easy share is for us!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: dianne
Reviews.Content: IT IS EVERY THING THEY SAY  ABOUT IT ALL GOOD  PICTURES ARE SO NICE WITH THIS CAMERA CAN BE  PUT ON  MY PC AND ELSE WHERE

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Sue Tornai
Reviews.Content: This camera fits in my purse and paid for itself with the first article I wrote and sent accompanying pictures.

Reviews.Title: Silver camera
Reviews.Author: Amelia johnson
Reviews.Content: I like the caller and the sleekness. The directions were very simple.  It's very simple so I know my cousin will like it. Also, I appreciate the fact that it arrived just in time to be shipped to him in Haiti.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Cristhian Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: It's an economic camera but with a good performance ... Comes in excellent conditions and takes beauty pictures for you

Reviews.Title: Bought for niece and nephew
Reviews.Author: jpittore
Reviews.Content: Great digital camera and easy to use.  Bought for my niece and nephew that are 7 and 10.  They had no problem operating the camera.  I also feel it is study enough for children to use with out the fear of it breaking.

Reviews.Title: kodak c1505 is great for a 7 year old..
Reviews.Author: Pinetop Phil
Reviews.Content: This camera is not a toy but rather a high quality digital camera for under $100.Gave it to our 7 year old grandkids, they took to it easily and it got them quicklyinterested in photography.

Reviews.Title: Gift for grab bag
Reviews.Author: Learn by Reading
Reviews.Content: Young girl asked for a digital camera and I didn't want to give her something that would fall apart or take crummy pictures.  After checking out other cameras this is the one I went with.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: michelle l mccain
Reviews.Content: Does everything my old Kodak did, was here quickly.paid less for it than the other camera that I purchased from Wally world that did not work so great

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share C1505 Camera
Reviews.Author: P. Trelinski
Reviews.Content: So far, I have no complaints.  The camera works extremely well.  It is easy to carry in my purse.  One thing to remember is that this camera takes regular batteries.  You do not speciality batteries.  I thought that was a great selling point.  Don't forget to buy memory to go in the camera.

Reviews.Title: piece of junk
Reviews.Author: nan
Reviews.Content: zoom?  it makes everything is blurry!  will have to spend more money to buy better.  So disappointed in this Kodak.

Reviews.Title: Piece of garbage!
Reviews.Author: C. Jackson "Mom of 4"
Reviews.Content: It is small..It is easy to use.It is value priced.It's a nice looking camera.Can be used with SD card.It was difficult to use from the beginning but she kept trying.Battery drains almost immediately.SD Card kept losing it's formatting.Terrible!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera...
Reviews.Author: Robbie the Rat!
Reviews.Content: I Really Like This Kodak For The Easy Function & Style. Such A Great Purchase Price, How Could Anyone Complain. The Shipping Was Very Expedient. *I'll Continue To Purchased From This Company (thank you)!

Reviews.Title: A fantastic camera in silver
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: This camera is terrific. Not only does it give quality photos. Not only does camera have the right features; but it comes in silver (my favorite color). For a camera like this, I would use a New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!. I find it to be perfect for a camera like this. Aside from that, I think this is a must own for anyone who loves taking photos

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Laura Prada
Reviews.Content: I did not like the quality of this camera or photo quality so I returned it. I would not recommend this Camera at all.

Reviews.Title: Not happy with product at all
Reviews.Author: Sue Culliton
Reviews.Content: I was only able to take several pictures, and by accident I dropped it. Now it does'nt operate at all. I am very disappointed

Reviews.Title: Great Camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: JAL
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift.I was told they enjoy using it very much.Great photo quality and easy to use. Great for uploading photos to Facebook.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Vicky in TN
Reviews.Content: BEST GIFT AND PRICE!  TAKES GREAT PICS TO AND VIDEOS.....GAVE AS A GIFT AND LIKED IT SO MUCH THAT I PURCHASED MYSELF ONE :)

Reviews.Title: easy to use digital camera
Reviews.Author: BigMo
Reviews.Content: previously submitted my review on this item.please check.very good ergonomic design,great camera .note: please read my detailed review previously submitted.thank youBIGMO

Reviews.Title: C1505 not as good as my old Kodak C433
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased the C1505 camera to replace my 6 year old Kodak C433 that was stolen by Seoul airport security during the security screening process while exiting Korea.I thought having over 3 times the number of pixels would make this a better camera, but my old 4 mega pixel camera was far better.  It must have had better optics that more than compensated for the increased pixels.  The C1505 camera's lens does not move in and out to focus, so it must all be internally done and perhaps by software.The price for the 2 cameras is similar so I would think the quality of pictures would be similar.Functionality the cameras offer similar options.  The C1505 is not as friendly getting to the options.  Most settings are displayed on the back screen as opposed to external dial type settings.  So in bright sunlight it is hard to see how the camera is set up for pictures.  Recently I thought I had the video function working while outside in the sun, but was disappointed to find out that it was not turned on.  I missed capturing 2 black hawk helicopters landing in celebration of memorial day events.I would not purchase this camera again.

Reviews.Title: piece of junk!
Reviews.Author: tmrosla
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews for this and they were so varied that I wasn't quite sure which to believe. I should have believed the bad reviews on this one! (Actually, I should have gone to a store first and tested it out) I figure that the people that wrote the good reviews have never had a nice camera before. After losing my Sony CyberShot, this one seems like a child's toy. Which it will be, I am giving it to my 4-year-old to play with and buying a Nikon. I have had a Kodak Easyshare in the past, and I loved it. They are easy to use, I will give them that. That old 4.1 MP that I had took way better pictures than this piece of s***, I actually won a photography contest and people asked me what camera I used to take the picture. They couldn't believe it! Now I have to struggle to get a decent picture with this thing that I thought would be an upgrade. How wrong I was! What happened to you, Kodak????

Reviews.Title: Don't bother if you have Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Great camera if you don't have Windows 8.....No way to easily download the pictures on the camera ..  I'm going to trash this (waited to long before using it)...PIECE OF JUNK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: If you've never had a good camera then this will b fine
Reviews.Author: Nsn+botdf=life
Reviews.Content: This is an absolutely terrible camera. I had an Olympus and it was amazing . This is disappointing . I shouldn't have wasted the money

Reviews.Title: acker
Reviews.Author: C. Ackermann "ca"
Reviews.Content: The absolute worse camera I have ever, ever used.  I have never written a negative review in my life but I wouldn't even take this camera if it was free.

ProductInfo.Features:
Kodak's Share Button tags to FACEBOOK and more3
Advanced video features
Multiple scene modes and color options
High ISO (1250)
Runs on AA batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare C1505 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Zoom - Silver
